snippet: The employment cost index, the broadest measure of labor costs, edged up 0.2 percent in the second quarter, the Labor Department said on Friday.
abstract: Labor Department reports employment cost index, broadest measure of labor costs, rose 0.2 percent in second quarter, smallest increase in 33 years.
lead_paragraph: The employment cost index, the broadest measure of labor costs, edged up 0.2 percent in the second quarter, the Labor Department said on Friday.

headline.main: Labor Costs Rise at Slowest Pace in 33 Years
headline.print_headline: While Job Market Tightens, Labor Costs Rise at Slowest Pace in 33 Years
